name: choice
author: z1p
description: Choice plugins enables functionality to pause a given flow and await user response to a given question i.e. Do you wish to continue?. When a response is provided the flow can continue or stop.

choice.description: Collection that holds choices and flow states.

fields.label: data
fields.description: Restore state of the data json object at the time of raising a choice.

fields.label: token
fields.description: Generated UID token for a given choice.

fields.label: message
fields.description: The question or message to display to the user when they access the URL with the token.

fields.label: answer
fields.description: True or False answer to the question.

fields.label: answerTime
fields.description: The time the answer was provided.

fields.label: complete
fields.description: Will remain False until and answer has been provided and the flow has not been resumed. Once the flow has been resumed this is set to True.

requestChoice.description: Pauses a flow and generates a token and URL for providing an answer to a yes/no question.

fields.label: message
fields.description: The yes/no question to provide when the url is accessed with the token generated.

result.description: Returns True when a flow is continued otherwise False is returned along with a url and token.

rc.description: Returns the exit code for the action.

data.token.description: When a flow is paused a token is generated and returned.

data.url.description: When a flow is paused a url including the token is returned.

msg.description: A message that outlines additional information about the result.

choiceTrigger.description: Core choice system action that processes answered questions and resumes paused flows.

result.description: Returns True after all choices have been processed.

rc.description: Returns the exit code 0 after all choices have been processed.
